Metadata.title: GCopy - Sync text screenshot & file
Metadata.description: A clipboard synchronization web service for different devices that can synchronize text, screenshots, and files.

Notice.title: Notice
Notice.shareClipboard: Click Allow when the browser asks you if it can See text and images copied to the clipboard.
Notice.protectPrivacy: GCopy protects your privacy data by temporarily storing your latest clipboard data in memory only. GCopy does not persist your clipboard data.

EmailCode.title: Sign in
EmailCode.subTitle: Support for text, screenshots & file synchronization.
EmailCode.tip: Your privacy is important to GCopy!
EmailCode.sendEmailFailed: Failed to send email. Please check and retry.

Login.title: Enter code
Login.subTitle: We emailed a code to {email}. Please enter the code to sign in.
Login.tip: Your privacy is important to GCopy!
Login.incorrectCode: Incorrect code. Please go back and retry.
Login.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed. Please go back and retry.

SyncClipboard.title: Sync the clipboard
SyncClipboard.subTitle: Press the button and the clipboard synced between devices.

syncFile.title: Sync the files
syncFile.subTitle: Drag and drop a file here to sync it to different devices.
syncFile.dragDropTip: Drag and drop a file here

quickInput.title: Quick input
quickInput.subTitle: Type text, press the button and the text synced between devices.
